title: Wilbur wants to kill himself [DVD]
creator_credit: Zentropa Entertainment6, Sisse Olsen and Lone Scherfig
brief_description: Set in Glasgow with Danish production “Wilbur wants to kill himself” is a bittersweet tale. Wilbur (Jamie Sives) has failed many attempts at suicide and having inherited a second hand book store is distracted from his morbid thoughts by an interesting customer. Supplementing her income by selling old books found in doctors waiting rooms Alice (Shirley Henderson) becomes part of Wilbur’s life. A charming comedy drama. Cast also includes Adrian Rawlings, Lisa McKinlay, Mads Mikkelson, Julia Davis and Susan Vidler.
